response.job_title: Full Stack Developer | Site Reliability Engineer | React | AWS | Typescript | Node | Nest | Next | Kubernetes
response.summary:
I'm a Fullstack Web Developer based in Colombia. I have 3+ years of experience as Web Developer and I've been working remotely for clients in Colombia and other parts of the world for 2+ years. Additionally, Telematics and Systems student engineer with 3+ years of experience in the development of projects with a desire to work as an engineer around the world. I have high level knowledge in automation, provisioning, configuration, monitoring and delivery of products such as Kubernetes, Docker and Jenkins. I have used several programming languages during my work as Python, Java, Javascript and I have also managed several databases such as Mongodb, Postgress and MySQL. Within the software development I have been able to work with REST API, CI/CD pipelines, error handling, unit testing, deployment and troubleshooting of runtime applications. I am a person with a lot of motivation to learn and I like to teach people what I learn day by day.
 
Specialties: Web Development / DevOps
Technologies: TypeScript / React / Nest / Next / Node / Express / Kubernetes
response.skills: GitOps, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, Argo CD, Docker Products, Flux, Sonarqube, Shell Scripting, Bash, SecOps, Java, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Vue.js, Go (Programming Language), Python (Programming Language), Software Architecture

profile_positions.description:
Lead Frontend Development: Take ownership of frontend projects, providing technical guidance and leading the development team to deliver high-quality solutions.
Architect and Design: Design scalable and maintainable frontend architectures using React and Next.js, considering performance, scalability, and code reusability.
UI/UX Implementation: Transform design mockups and wireframes into interactive and pixel-perfect user interfaces, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing user experience.
Component Library Development: Create and maintain a reusable component library, establishing design patterns, and promoting consistency across projects.
Performance Optimization: Optimize frontend performance by analyzing and improving load times, minimizing resource usage, and implementing caching strategies.
profile_positions.title: Senior Frontend Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Led the effort to migrate the entire company stack to containers and Kubernetes. Using EKS in AWS.
- Designed the deployment workflow and architecture for the Kubernetes clusters.
- AWS Experience (Cloudfront, EC2, S3, RDS, R53 and more)
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description: Full Stack developer for a US client in the business of programmatic advertising. The project is in development using Typescript, React, MySql, Mongo DB, Kafka, Next, Nest and other technologies. We follow high-quality standards and latest methodologies for agile development such as continuous delivery, peer review and peer programming.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer

profile_positions.description:
Duties:
- Participation in the structural design of technology stacks used in the project.
- Deploy of web application servers and databases SQL servers.
- Development and implementation of REST API to return queries to databases.
- I implemented responsive components using ReactJS V16.8, for a good user experience on mobile devices. 
- I developed components going from functional components, to using React Hooks, to improve the maintainability and readability of the code. 
- Develop a form, using the ReactJS React Hooks Form library, with their respective validations, in order to speed up the development process and use of already established tools. 
- Solve failures reported by the client in IOS devices, investigating possible solutions and implementing good practices in development. 
- Develop new components presented by the UX team, applying good layout and development practices. 

- Creation and consumption of RESTful web services with Spring Boot 2.
- Development of REST APIs through the microservices architecture.
- Use of shared database and between microservices (SQL and NoSQL).
- Authentication and Authorization with Spring Security OAuth 2.1, JWT and Spring Authorization Server.
- Basic use of Docker containers for deployment of microservices.

Technologies: React, Sass, Bootstrap, Javascript ES6, Git, Jira, Spring,Java, Redux, Next, Material UI.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer
